caption.p: Solid‐state molecular structure of 1‐σ (left); 24 ellipsoids are drawn at the 40 % probability level; H atoms are omitted and the [K([18]crown‐6)] + cation is transparent for clarity; selected bond lengths [Å] and bond angles [°]: Fe1‐P1: 2.0811(4), Fe1‐N1: 1.9428(12), P1‐C1: 1.7733(13), C1‐C2: 1.3953(19), C2‐C3: 1.3947(18), C3‐C4: 1.4343(18), C4‐C5: 1.3756(18), C5‐P1: 1.7757(13), P1‐Fe1‐N1: 82.32(4), Fe1‐P1‐C1: 107.62(4), Fe1‐N1‐C6: 124.18(9), Cp*‐Fe1‐N1: 135.513(8), P1‐Fe1‐Cp*: 140.545(9). Side view of solid‐state molecular structure of 1‐σ (right); for clarity, one additional phenyl group is also transparent.
